lead_paragraph: WEISSMAN--Alfred. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Alfred Weissman, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Alfred's beloved wife, Connie; his children, Alan (Gigi), David, and Julie (Michael); his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
